result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Erin B. Schoelzel

records.addlTxt:
3:01 p.m.
Clerk Micki.
INCLUDES 21CF437, 21CF683, 21CF1406, 22CF559 and 22CF288

State appears by DDA Molly Lawrence; Defendant appears in person, with Attorney Julianne Lennon.

Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
COURT advises defendant of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & questions defendant to understanding.

State moves to: 
21CF437
COUNT 1: False Imprisonment, Domestic Abuse >> DRI.
21CF683
COUNT 1: Bail Jumping Felony >> DRI.
21CF1406
COUNT 1: Intimidate Victim/Domestic Abuse Crime, Domestic Abuse >> DRI.
COUNT 2: Bail Jumping Felony >> DRI.
COUNT 3: Bail Jumping Felony >> DRI.
COUNT 4: Bail Jumping Felony >> DRI.
COUNT 5: Bail Jumping Felony >> DRI.
22CF288
COUNT 1: Bail Jumping Felony >> DRI.
22CF559
COUNT 1: Bail Jumping Felony >> DRI.
COUNT 2: Bail Jumping Felony >> DRI.
COUNT 3: Bail Jumping Felony >> DRI.
COUNT 4: Bail Jumping Felony >> DRI. 

COURT GRANTS.

PLEA to:
21CF437
COUNT 2: Disorderly Conduct, Domestic Abuse >> NO CONTEST. 
COUNT 3: Battery, Domestic Abuse >> NO CONTEST. 
21CF683
COUNT 2: Disorderly Conduct, Domestic Abuse >> NO CONTEST. 
21CF1406
COUNT 6: Disorderly Conduct, Domestic Abuse >> NO CONTEST. 
22CF559
COUNT 5: Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription >> NO CONTEST. 

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & voluntary made, a factual basis & defendant guilty.

COURT ORDERS: SWH for 3 years probation; CONDITIONS: Assessments/Treatment/Counseling deemed appropriate by agent; AODA and f/u; SAFE and f/u; Maintain absolute sobriety from controlled substances, unless prescribed and to only be taken as prescribed; DV surcharge; DNA sample and surcharge; CC; Probation Review Hearings; and on 21CF437 (count 3), I/S 60 days jail for rule violations and I/S 30 hours of community service for rule violations. 

COURT grants defense 30 days to submit stipulation for jail credit. 

PRH: 11/11/22  at 1:15 p.m.

ADJ: 3:26 p.m.
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence; Defendant appears in person w/Attorney Julianne Lennon

JPTC 8/30 at 3:00 pm

from victim re no contact condition

AMENDED: Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Case Called: 10:53 am
INCLUDES 21CF1406, 21CF437, 21CF683, 22CF288.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by DDA Molly Lawrence in person. Defendant appears in person and with Atty Julianne Lennon in person. Victim appears in person in the Courtroom.
VRCW.
Date and time set to address the Defendant's Motion to Modify Bond regarding the Non Waivable No Contact. 
Court addresses the parties; 
Victim has provided a letter to give to the Court- State now provides the letter to the Court on behalf of the Victim for the Court's review. 
State does not object to the Motion at this time. Victim makes statement.
Court addresses the parties. 
COURT ORDERS:
Delete's No Contact Condition of all bonds with K.L.F. 
All other conditions are to remain on the bond(s).

COURT ORDERS:
Court Appoints Attorney Julianne Lennon in case 22CF288 at the rate of $100/Hour with a max of $800.

Court Orders that the Letter from the Victim is to be Confidential.

DATES:
Pretrial Conference with JA 05/31/2022 @ 10:30 am

Adjourned: 11:03 am

Bail/bond hearing on May 2, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on May 31, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Includes 21CF437, 21CF683, 21CF1406, 22CF288
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence; Defendant does not appear; Attorney Julianne Lennon appears in person.
Attorney Lennon does not represent defendant on 22CF288 (not eligible for SPD on that file).
Motion to Modify Non-Waiveable no contact on21CF1406 and 22CF288 set: May 2, 2022 at 10:30 am
PTC w/JA set on all pending files: May 31, 2022 at 10:30 am

No contact with victim(s) K.L.F. - not waivable unless through a court order. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
